title: Remove Caffeine.ai footer branding

requirements.text: Remove the “Built with … caffeine.ai” branding link from the bottom footer so no Caffeine AI / caffeine.ai text or link is shown anywhere in the app layout footer.

quotes: Remove the caffeine ai from bottom

acceptanceCriteria: The footer in `frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx` no longer renders the text 'Built with' or the 'caffeine.ai' link.
No hyperlink to `https://caffeine.ai/` is present in the rendered UI footer.
App layout spacing remains visually consistent after removing the footer branding (no awkward empty footer area).

constraints: Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose only).
Do not modify any paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing the header branding/logo or app title.
Any backend changes or data model changes.
